```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE, results="markup"}

data <- as_tibble(read.table("KORUZA.txt", header=TRUE))

ggplot(data, aes(x=gostvznika, y=gostsetve, col=blok)) +
    geom_point() +
    facet_grid(cols=vars(blok))






mod <- lm(log(data$gostsetve) ~ log(data$gostvznika))

par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(mod)

```
